chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
f: A -> nat

Goal:
forall (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) (l3 : list nat) (l4 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l2 -> prod2list (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = prod2list l1 l2 + prod2list l3 l4

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
prod2list = fun (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) => fold_left Init.Nat.add (map2 (fun (a : nat) (b : btree A) => a * sum_leaves f b + weight_tree f b) l1 l2) 0 : list nat -> list (btree A) -> nat Arguments prod2list (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
map2_app : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B -> C) (l1 : list A) (l2 : list B) (l3 : list A) (l4 : list B), length l1 = length l2 -> map2 f (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = map2 f l1 l2 ++ map2 f l3 l4
same_length_ex : forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A) (l3 : list B), length (l1 ++ a :: l2) = length l3 -> exists (l4 l5 : list B) (b : B), length l1 = length l4 /\ length l2 = length l5 /\ l3 = l4 ++ b :: l5
weight_tree_list_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2
ordered_sum_leaves_eq : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> ordered (sum_order f) l1 -> ordered (sum_order f) l2 -> map (sum_leaves f) l1 = map (sum_leaves f) l2
firstn_le_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> firstn n (l1 ++ l2) = l1 ++ firstn (n - length l1) l2
skipn_le_app2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n <= length l1 -> skipn n (l1 ++ l2) = skipn n l1 ++ l2
firstn_le_app2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n <= length l1 -> firstn n (l1 ++ l2) = firstn n l1
skipn_le_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> skipn n (l1 ++ l2) = skipn (n - length l1) l2
permutation_all_permutations_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n)
all_permutations_aux_permutation : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_trans : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
ulist_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), ulist l1 -> ulist l2 -> (forall a : A, In a l1 -> In a l2 -> False) -> ulist (l1 ++ l2)
ulist_app_inv_l : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), ulist (l1 ++ l2) -> ulist l1
nth_split : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
ulist_app_inv : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), ulist (l1 ++ l2) -> In a l1 -> In a l2 -> False
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
unique_key_app : forall (A B : Type) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)), unique_key l1 -> unique_key l2 -> (forall (a : A) (b c : B), In (a, b) l1 -> In (a, c) l2 -> False) -> unique_key (l1 ++ l2)
exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> [] -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
ulist_app_inv_r : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), ulist (l1 ++ l2) -> ulist l2
firstn_le_length_eq : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 : list A), n <= length l1 -> length (firstn n l1) = n
list_length_induction : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), (forall l1 : list A, (forall l2 : list A, length l2 < length l1 -> P l2) -> P l1) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_length_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), (forall l1 : list A, (forall l2 : list A, length l2 < length l1 -> P l2) -> P l1) -> forall l : list A, P l
weight_tree_list : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> list (btree A) -> nat
Inductive permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation [] [] | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_nil _%type_scope Arguments permutation_skip _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans _%type_scope (_ _ _)%list_scope
weight_tree_list_node : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), weight_tree_list f (node t1 t2 :: l) = sum_leaves f t1 + sum_leaves f t2 + weight_tree_list f (t1 :: t2 :: l)
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
permutation_skip : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1)
permutation_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) -> permutation l1 l2

```coq
```coq
unfold prod2list. rewrite map2_app. rewrite map2_app. rewrite length_map2. rewrite length_map2. rewrite map_length. rewrite map_length.
rewrite weight_tree_list_permutation with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2) (f := f).
rewrite ordered_sum_leaves_eq with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2) (f := f).
rewrite map_map. rewrite map_map. rewrite fold_left_map.
rewrite Init.Nat.add_0_r. rewrite fold_left_init.
rewrite map_map. rewrite map_map. rewrite map_sum_leaves.
rewrite sum_leaves_node. rewrite sum_leaves_node.
rewrite weight_tree_list_node with (t1 := t1) (t2 := t2) (l := l) (f := f).
rewrite sum_leaves_leaf. rewrite sum_leaves_leaf.
rewrite weight_tree_list_permutation with (l1 := l3) (l2 := l4) (f := f).
rewrite ordered_sum_leaves_eq with (l1 := l3) (l2 := l4) (f := f).
rewrite map_map. rewrite map_map. rewrite fold_left_map.
rewrite Init.Nat.add_0_r. rewrite fold_left_init.
rewrite map_map. rewrite map_map. rewrite map_sum_leaves.
rewrite sum_leaves_node. rewrite sum_leaves_node.
rewrite weight_tree_list_node with (t1 := t1) (t2 := t2) (l := l) (f := f).
rewrite sum_leaves_leaf. rewrite sum_leaves_leaf.
auto.
Qed.
